columns.name: tareWeight
columns.description: Tare weight of the empty ULD

columns.name: remarks
columns.description: Remarks or Supplement Information

columns.name: checks
columns.description: References to the CheckActions performed on the object

columns.name: events
columns.description: Events object

columns.name: externalReferences
columns.description: References to all associated ExternalReferences

columns.name: skeletonIndicator
columns.description: Indicator whether a logistics object is a skeleton object

columns.name: attachedIotDevices
columns.description: References to all connected IotDevices

columns.name: involvedInActions
columns.description: References to the Actions the object is involved in

columns.name: demurrageCode
columns.description: Contains three designator of demurrage code

columns.name: loadingIndicator
columns.description: ULD height or loading limitation code. Refer CXML Code List 1.47

columns.name: odlnCode
columns.description: Contains two designator codes of ODLN or Operational Damage Limit Notices. ODLN code is used to define type of damage after visually check the serviceability of ULDs section 7

columns.name: ownerCode
columns.description: Owner code of the ULD in aa

columns.name: serviceabilityCode
columns.description: Designator of serviceablity condition e.g. SER or DAM

columns.name: uldTypeCode
columns.description: Standard Unit Load Device type code e.g. AKE - Certified Container - Contoured. Refer to IATA ULD Technical Manual

columns.name: ataDesignator
columns.description: US / ATA Unit Load Device type code e.g. M2

columns.name: damageFlag
columns.description: Indicates if the ULD is Damaged

columns.name: numberOfDoors
columns.description: Number of doors

columns.name: numberOfFittings
columns.description: Number of fittings

columns.name: numberOfNets
columns.description: Number of nets

columns.name: numberOfStraps
columns.description: Number of straps

columns.name: sealNumber
columns.description: ULD seal number if applicable

columns.name: uldSerialNumber
columns.description: Serial number that allows to uniquely identify the ULD
